name: Scratch Navigation Bar Modifier
description: Changes various colours of the navigation bar on scratch.mit.edu. Please note it only currently works on the thick navigation bar in the new design, so My Stuff and Account Settings won't be changed as they still use the old design.

user.name: Jamie Michaelson
user.about: I make things, I don't really know what else to say. Donate if you enjoy? Okay.
